items.sentence: I wonder why Tom told me I didn\'t have to do that.
Everything was done right, down to the last detail.
Apparently, Tom is going to a university in Boston.
Are there any good places to play golf around here?
Are you aware of anyone who would want to harm Tom?
Tom didn\'t seem very surprised that Mary did that.
Tom learned how to sing many songs from his father.
Tom likes reading science fiction novels in French.
Please turn off the lights when you leave the room.
I can\'t complain about the way I\'ve been treated.
